vsParam:
Hmm, so this is how Donner Stone looks like
in this world... Um? Isn't it just stone!?

Of course, this is "Donnerst".
But what is Donner Stone...

A bomb twined by thunder.
Just as its name implies, it looks more like stone.

Yeah. Back in my world, it's called "Donner Stone".
I think Totori once made "Donner Stone" too?
I think it's just an abbreviation...

Maybe.
At least, I have never seen it.

Yeah, "Donnerst" will start storms.
Donner Stones will summon thunders!

Thunders...
It sounds like a potent bomb.

I'm very powerful, but I tend to take cover
in [px]'s backpack when I hear thunder!
Fine... I can't believe that intimidates you, Master Peppermint.

Yeah... Sure!
But just a few things intimidate me!

Jesus!! Hey, don't frighten me like that!
It'll still shock me even though I'm not afraid!

Haha, sorry! Let's talk about what intimidates
Master Peppermint later...
It's kind of awesome if you can control wind and thunder.

Yeah, you don't say!?
All the items made with alchemy are powerful.

Use the power of nature to make items and
control them freely... Alchemists are very great.

Great? I'm really flattered.
But Nelke is almost a great alchemist!
Yeah! It must be easier for Nelke to learn alchemy fast!
So... you need to try your best to finish your assignment!

Great... Ah!
I accidentally dropped my Donnerst...!

Ahhh, the wind, ahhh! It'll blow me away!
Help, [px]~! Gosh!!!!
